headline: New Fall Hours
paragraph: The Library is open! Please check our Fall Opening Guide for updates about our spaces and services.

headline: GIS Day Call for Presentations
paragraph: GIS Day @ U of I is looking for short talks highlighting your geospatial related research or project to be presented live online during the virtual event.

image-alt: tools on wall by Barn Images
headline: Workshop Videos & Slides
paragraph: Find videos, slides, and more from library workshops on our Resources page. Browse our content to learn something new or refresh your library skills!

headline: Library Instruction
paragraph: Librarians offer instruction sessions on dozens of topics. Browse expertise and request a classroom session!

headline: Library Statement on Racism
paragraph: The U of I Library Commits to Acting Against Racism.

headline: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Explore our new My Library stories highlighting students and little-known library services.
